tournament.name: Liga Paulista - 3º LPL Open - Season V

decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent to apply early pressure on opponents. It also includes disruptive spells like Daze, Force of Will, and Force of Negation to protect its threats and control the game. The deck includes cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder for card selection, as well as removal like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat to deal with opposing threats. The mana base is streamlined with fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent casting of spells and maintaining tempo advantage.

This deck focuses on combining aggressive creatures with disruptive elements to control the board while pressuring the opponent. Utilizing cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Spirit of the Labyrinth to slow down the opponent's game plan, while using Stoneforge Mystic to find powerful equipment like Batterskull and Umezawa's Jitte to close out the game. The deck also includes synergies with Flickerwisp and Ephemerate to generate value and outmaneuver the opponent. With a mix of efficient threats and disruptive elements, this deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while presenting a fast clock to secure victory.

This deck focuses on assembling a fast and aggressive Goblin tribe, utilizing cards such as Muxus, Goblin Grandee and Goblin Rabblemaster to overwhelm opponents with a swarm of creatures. It also includes disruptive elements like Chalice of the Void and Cavern of Souls to protect your key creatures from opposing spells. The aim is to quickly flood the board with Goblin creatures, backed up by cards like Battle Cry Goblin and Broadside Bombardiers to deal massive amounts of damage early in the game, ultimately overwhelming the opponent before they can establish their own game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly generating mana and casting multiple spells in a single turn to create a powerful combo that can win the game in one explosive turn. By using cards like Burning Wish and Bonus Round to search for pieces of the combo, along with mana acceleration from Rite of Flame and Seething Song, the deck aims to play a high number of spells to overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Galvanic Relay and Wrenn's Resolve provides card advantage and protection to ensure the combo goes off successfully.

The main concept of this deck is to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy by using cards like Stifle and Swords to Plowshares. The deck also aims to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Phyrexian Dreadnought and Brazen Borrower while having protection with cards like Brainstorm, Daze, and Force of Will. The inclusion of cards like Prismatic Ending and Dress Down provides additional versatility and options for dealing with threats. The mana base is structured to support the control elements of the deck while ensuring consistency in playing spells.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's mana base and control the board with aggressive creatures. By using cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void, the deck aims to lock down the opponent's lands while deploying resilient threats like Goblin Rabblemaster and Broadside Bombardiers. The deck also includes burn spells like Fury and Shatterskull Smashing to close out the game quickly. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around applying early pressure and disrupting the opponent's resources to secure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures and disruptive spells to gain an aggressive advantage over opponents. By quickly developing a board presence with versatile creatures like Knight of the Reliquary and Questing Beast, the deck aims to pressure opponents while disrupting their game plan with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Gaddock Teeg. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive strategy, with access to powerful lands like Gaea's Cradle and Wasteland to further enhance its board control and tempo advantage.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on utilizing artifacts and graveyard synergies to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By combining cards like Goblin Welder, Lotus Petal, and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker with aggressive creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Orcish Bowmasters, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. Additionally, cards like Ensnaring Bridge and Nihil Spellbomb provide disruption and graveyard hate to deal with opposing strategies. The inclusion of Urza's Saga adds extra versatility by tutoring for key artifacts to enhance the deck's aggro game plan.

The main concept of this Legacy 1 vs 1 deck is to ramp up mana quickly by utilizing Cloudpost and Glimmerpost lands, allowing for the quick deployment of powerful threats such as Emrakul, Primeval Titan, and Ulamog. The deck focuses on assembling the pieces needed for powerful combos, such as Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage, while also utilizing cards like Crop Rotation and Green Sun's Zenith for flexibility and consistency. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with fast mana acceleration and high-impact plays.
